title: Direct Savings for Direct Flights
seo_description: Hurry Limited Time Only– Save up to 15% off on your stay + Receive 50% off on Resort Fee.
long_description:
Relax by the pool and enjoy beautiful blue sky and warm sun. If you need some refreshments you are only steps away from cool delicious cocktails.

Receive up to 15% off + 50% off on Resort Fee.

Late check out at 1 PM.

BOOK NOW
terms_conditions:
Guests have up to 14 days prior to check in date to change or cancel a reservation.

Deposit of 1 night room and tax is required for all confirmed reservations.

Please note that changing arrival /departure date may result in rate changes and /or loss of special offer availability if any.

A hold of $100 will be placed on the guest credit card at check-in for incidentals. This hold will be released upon check-out pending any incidental charges.

Early Departure will be charged 100% on the applicable rate plus taxes.

Exceptions :

Notification of 21 days prior to check in to change or cancel a reservation for the dates 10/22, 10/23, 10/24, 12/24, 12/25, 12/26, 12/27, 12/28, 12/29, 12/30, 12/31, 1/1, 1/2 after which the entire reservation will be Non Refundable.

Resort Fee prior to January 1st, 2019: $30.00 plus tax, per room, per night

Resort Fee provides guests the following services:

• Shuttle service loop to old town.

• Onsite concierge.

• Access to fitness center and 2 pools.

• Newspaper available in lobby.

• Resort activities and entertainment.

• Daily water in room.

• Keepsake luggage tags.

• Wireless high speed internet access.

• Local calls.

• Onsite parking.

• 10% off Starbucks.

Guarantee/Deposit and Change/Cancellation Fees will depend on selected dates and room/rate combination.
